Text:
I tried everything, but I still have a a patch problem. I can start it just fine, and after I click update, it tries to update but a few seconds after it I get this message: 

Preparing launcher...
Patching LANLauncher.exe
Error Patching: Error binary patching file

After that I can just cancel the update. The same happens in Windows Safe mode, so it's not like the internet connection has anything to do with it.

Help would be appreciated.
